attributes.action: Pass into law, That it is illegal to discriminate against members of the British Armed Forces on the grounds of their employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more blatant discrimination against members of the armed forces is creeping into daily life.
We, the serving and ex members of the armed forces are saddened and ashamed by the lack of support currently being shown in general.
More so at a very recent case of discrimination, Corporal stringer being refused a hotel room on the grounds of being a soldier.
Soldiers being abused in the streets whilst in uniform!
This has to stop, we serve a country that has very little pride or respect for us, and all we face is discrimination and hate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
